price: àwọn wọ̀nyẹn, ibùgbé wọn ni Iná nítorí ohun tí wọ́n ń ṣe níṣẹ́.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: ulāika mawāhumu al-nāru bimā kānū yaksibūna
